src_original: iha subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti /  kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti?
tathā subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti,  evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
iha subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti /  kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti?
tathā subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti,  evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti /
evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatastathāgatatathatayā ca skandhatathatayā ca unmiñjitanimiñjitatathatayā ca tathatāṃ prajñapayati /
uktaṃ hyetatsubhūte tathāgatena - pañca skandhā loka iti saṃjñātāḥ iti /
